title: GAME SETTINGS
text:
Pack difficulty is rated on a scale from ! to !!!!!.

Please note: any card packs rated !!!! or higher will require you to enable NSFW mode to access them (this can be found in the settings).

title: DRINK WHEEL
text: Enable the <highlight>Drink Wheel</highlight> to add a fun twist to your drinking game! The wheel gives you a 50% chance of taking 1 sip, with smaller odds for 2, 3, or 4 sips — or even having to down your whole drink.

title: PACK: CALM AND CASUAL <highlight>!</highlight>
text: A wholesome mix of fun, everyday scenarios and dream-big moments—from going viral to starting a podcast. Light, playful, and perfect for spotting hidden talents and quirks in your group.

title: PACK: MILD MISCHIEF <highlight>!!</highlight>
text: A playful mix of harmless chaos, awkward moments, and everyday slip-ups. Expect accidental texts, lost phones, weird crushes, and low-stakes mayhem that'll make everyone laugh and point fingers.

title: PACK: UNSOLICITED STRAYS <highlight>!!!</highlight>
text: A chaotic blend of risky romance, bad decisions, and wild what-ifs. Think ex texts, secret hookups, late-night confessions, and moments you’d never want on record.

title: PACK: OPEN SEASON <highlight class='NSFW'>!!!!</highlight>
text: No rules, no regrets. A shameless deep dive into hookups, betrayals, dirty secrets, and moments you hope never see daylight.

title: PACK: UNFILITED ASSAULTS <highlight class='NSFW'>!!!!!</highlight>
text: Brace yourself. This pack pulls no punches—raw, explicit, and offensively honest. Not for the faint of heart or the easily offended.
